name: treehouse-lookup
description: ## Example:      node app.js JavaScript username1 username 2 Will output the number of badges username1 and username 2 have earned, as well as the points they have accumulated in the JavaScript section in Treehouse. ``` username1 has x total badge(s) and x points in JavaScript. username2 has x total badge(s) and x points in JavaScript. ``` ## Installation:  Clone this repo and run in terminal/command prompt with NodeJS installed.
author: Rakeem Thomas
